document_data.mainbody:
'''"Zikran's Zephyrean Tome"''' is a short adventure module for 10{{th}}–level players, collected in the anthology ''[[Candlekeep Mysteries]]'', where players are tasked with freeing a noble [[djinni]] trapped in a [[wizard]]'s [[spellbook]].
{{TOC limit|2}}
document_data.Synopsis: In [[1492 DR]], a group of [[adventurer]]s in Candlekeep investigate the [[magic]]ally sealed tome ''[[Zikran's Zephyrean Tome]]'' and discover the noble djinni [[Gazre-Azam]] is trapped inside. Gazre-Azam offers the adventurers a single casting of ''[[wish]]'' in exchange for tracking down and defeating the person responsible for his imprisonment: the evil [[archmage]] [[Zikran]].
